title: Hertz hires a former Goldman Sachs finance chief as its C.E.O. - The New York Times
content:
1. Hertz hires a former Goldman Sachs finance chief as its C.E.O.  The New York Times
  2. Hertz names ex-Goldman finance chief Stephen Scherr as CEO  The Detroit News
  3. Hertz Names Goldman Ex-Finance Chief Stephen Scherr as CEO  Bloomberg
  4. New Hertz CEO Will Be Ex-Goldman Sachs Finance Chief Stephen Scherr  Skift
  5. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Stephen Scheer, who served as chief financial officer at Goldman Sachs until the end of last year, will take over Hertz and join its board on Feb. 28.
